name: ShapeSort
description:
Sort some shapes, by yourself or with a friend.  Get the colored shapes onto their corresponding side. If you take too long or sort them incorrectly, they explode, dealing a bunch of damage.

Player 1 Controls:

  • Forward : W
  • Right : D
  • Left : A
  • Backward : S
  • Slow Down: Shift

Player 2 Controls:

  • Forward : Up
  • Right : Right
  • Left : Left
  • Backward : Down
  • Slow Down: Enter
